hopobject.name: where-is-beagleboardorg-headed
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.71 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
Where is BeagleBoard.org headed?

The ultimate goal is to improve access to technology that can be helpful in solving problems. The question is, what are the most critical problems the organization can be involved in solving?

What have I learned?

The everyday second grader and everyday electronics design engineer certainly have different care abouts, but they are also remarkably similar. Beyond the obvious need for a nap in the afternoon that they feel they've outgrown, they are also both plagued by incredibly short attention spans.

Collaborative

Open
